page.shortlink: ux list convert data source sql options properties
page.description: Options for configuring the target SQL data source.

section.title: Bind to existing or new table

item.name: ExistingTable
item.description: Bind the list to an existing table in the target SQL data source.

item.name: NewTable
item.description: Create a new table in the target SQL data source.

description.p: An AlphaDAO connection string defining the SQL data source that contains the target table to bind the List.
If checked, Static data in the List will be inserted into the target table. This option is only available if the *[ui:Bind to existing or new table?]* property has been set to "NewTable".
The name of the target table to create.
If the target table exists, checking this option will delete the table in the SQL data source and re-create it using the defined *[ui:Target table definition and field mappings]*.

section.title: Target table definition and field mappings

ref.link: ux list control Converting Static Data into SQL Data

see.ref: Converting Static Data into SQL Data
